ViewObject.Name: LovBankCoaVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT a.coa_id COA_ID, a.coa_nm COA_NM , e.curr_id_sp FROM fin.fin$coa a, FIN.org$coa b, FIN.fin$cog c, FIN.fin$acc$na d, app.app$eo e, FIN.fin$na$type_vw f,app.org o
WHERE a.coa_cld_id= b.cld_id AND a.coa_sloc_id = b.org_sloc_id and a.coa_ho_org_id=b.ho_org_id AND a.coa_id = b.org_coa_id AND a.coa_actv = 'Y' AND b.org_coa_actv = 'Y'
AND a.coa_cld_id = c.cog_cld_id and a.coa_sloc_id= c.cog_sloc_id AND a.coa_ho_org_id = c.cog_org_id AND a.coa_cog_id = c.cog_id AND c.cog_actv = 'Y'
and a.coa_cld_id = d.acc_cld_id and a.coa_sloc_id = d.acc_sloc_id AND a.coa_ho_org_id = d.ho_org_id AND a.coa_acc_id = d.acc_id AND d.acc_actv = 'Y'
and d.acc_cld_id = e.eo_cld_id(+) and d.acc_sloc_id = e.eo_sloc_id(+) AND d.ho_org_id = e.eo_ho_org_id(+) AND d.acc_type_id = e.eo_id(+) and d.acc_type=e.eo_type(+)
AND f.na_type_id = d.acc_type
and a.coa_cld_id = :BindCldId and b.org_id = :BindOrgId and a.coa_ho_org_id = :BindHoOrgId AND a.coa_sloc_id = :BindSlocId and f.na_type_id = 78 and e.curr_id_sp is not null
and e.Curr_Id_Sp=O.Org_Curr_Id_Bs and E.Eo_Cld_Id=O.Org_Cld_Id and E.Eo_Sloc_Id=O.Org_Create_Ref_Sloc_Id and E.Eo_Ho_Org_Id=O.Org_Id
order by 2
